properties.areaDesc: Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Grand and Battlement Mesas
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 4:59PM MST until February 7 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches
likely in the higher elevations of the Grand Mesa, Battlement
Mesa, and along Highway 13 near Rio Blanco hill.

* WHERE...Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus and Grand and Battlement
Mesas.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times. A detailed map of
the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY
